kb3.name: kb3_mails
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_mails` ( `kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `kll_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL default "0000-00-00 00:00:00", `kll_external_id` int(8) default NULL, `kll_hash` BINARY(16) NOT NULL, `kll_trust` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`kll_id`), UNIQUE KEY `external_id` (`kll_external_id`), UNIQUE KEY `time_hash` (`kll_timestamp`,`kll_hash`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
